_sText:
Fixed the doors that where too small and the spawns.

Holds 30 people, 10 on CT and 20 on T. 

There are 3 guns cells, 3 nade cells, one vent cell and several ways to rebel. Rebelling isn't too easy but not ridiculously hard either. A lot of the rebelling spots are somewhat hard to find and blend in well. 

The map is made to look like a hospital. The west (I think) wing upper floor is just for show and doesn't actually go anywhere, same with the bottom part a little further in. 

!lr room is in the basement and has Gun Toss and S4S and a good place for knife fighting and whatnot. Also contains a pool that doesn't actually do much but looks pretty. Doesn't have soccer because: 
* I've never seen a hospital with a soccer court.
* No one ever plays soccer in jail.

Really only contains the necessary stuff that is actually used frequently.
